PackageOracle.name: DA_PO_BOX_ADDR
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_PO_BOX_ADDR
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.08.482661000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,po_box_num IN VARCHAR2
,city_id IN NUMBER
,territory_id IN NUMBER
,postal_code_id IN NUMBER
,country_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,po_box_num IN VARCHAR2
,city_id IN NUMBER
,territory_id IN NUMBER
,postal_code_id IN NUMBER
,country_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,po_box_id IN NUMBER
,po_box_num IN VARCHAR2
,city_id IN NUMBER
,territory_id IN NUMBER
,postal_code_id IN NUMBER
,country_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,po_box_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_po_box_addr;

body.name: DA_PO_BOX_ADDR
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_PO_BOX_ADDR
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.08.493905000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,po_box_num IN VARCHAR2
,city_id IN NUMBER
,territory_id IN NUMBER
,postal_code_id IN NUMBER
,country_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_po_box_addr.add(fx), parms=' || po_box_num || '|' || city_id || '|' || territory_id || '|' || postal_code_id || '|' || country_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_po_box_addr a
(
a.po_box_id
,a.po_box_num
,a.city_id
,a.territory_id
,a.postal_code_id
,a.country_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_po_box_id.NEXTVAL
,add.po_box_num
,add.city_id
,add.territory_id
,add.postal_code_id
,add.country_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.po_box_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_po_box_addr.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,po_box_num IN VARCHAR2
,city_id IN NUMBER
,territory_id IN NUMBER
,postal_code_id IN NUMBER
,country_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_po_box_addr.add, parms=' || po_box_num || '|' || city_id || '|' || territory_id || '|' || postal_code_id || '|' || country_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_po_box_addr a
(
a.po_box_id
,a.po_box_num
,a.city_id
,a.territory_id
,a.postal_code_id
,a.country_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_po_box_id.NEXTVAL
,add.po_box_num
,add.city_id
,add.territory_id
,add.postal_code_id
,add.country_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_po_box_addr.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,po_box_id IN NUMBER
,po_box_num IN VARCHAR2
,city_id IN NUMBER
,territory_id IN NUMBER
,postal_code_id IN NUMBER
,country_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_po_box_addr.add, parms=' || po_box_id || '|' || po_box_num || '|' || city_id || '|' || territory_id || '|' || postal_code_id || '|' || country_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_po_box_addr a
(
a.po_box_id
,a.po_box_num
,a.city_id
,a.territory_id
,a.postal_code_id
,a.country_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.po_box_id
,add.po_box_num
,add.city_id
,add.territory_id
,add.postal_code_id
,add.country_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_po_box_addr.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,po_box_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_po_box_addr.del, parms=' || po_box_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_po_box_addr a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.po_box_id = del.po_box_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_po_box_addr.del');

END del;

END da_po_box_addr;
